mapper.sql: FACTORY_ID, FULL_NAME, FACTORY_NAME, CONTACTS, PHONE, MOBILE, FAX, CNOTE, INSPECTOR, ORDER_NO, STATE, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DEPT, CREATE_TIME
mapper.select:
select * from( SELECT t1.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn,t.STATE,t.factory_id,t.full_name,t.factory_name,t.contacts,t.phone,t.mobile ,t.fax,t.cnote,t.inspector,t.CREATE_TIME FROM FACTORY_C t where 1=1 and t.STATE=1
and t.FACTORY_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{factoryName}),'%')
and t.CONTACTS like concat(concat('%',#{contacts}),'%')
and t.phone like concat(concat('%',#{phone}),'%')
and t.mobile like concat(concat('%',#{mobile}),'%')
and t.fax like concat(concat('%',#{fax}),'%')
and t.cnote like concat(concat('%',#{cnote}),'%')
and t.full_name like concat(concat('%',#{fullName}),'%')
) t1 where t1.rn >= #{start} )t2 where t2.rn <= #{end} ORDER BY t2.CREATE_TIME desc

select count(t.factory_id) from FACTORY_C t where 1=1 and t.STATE=1
and t.FACTORY_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{factoryName}),'%')
and t.CONTACTS like concat(concat('%',#{contacts}),'%')
and t.phone like concat(concat('%',#{phone}),'%')
and t.mobile like concat(concat('%',#{mobile}),'%')
and t.fax like concat(concat('%',#{fax}),'%')
and t.cnote like concat(concat('%',#{cnote}),'%')
and t.full_name like concat(concat('%',#{fullName}),'%')
mapper.insert: insert into FACTORY_C (FACTORY_ID, FULL_NAME, FACTORY_NAME, CONTACTS, PHONE, MOBILE, FAX, CNOTE, INSPECTOR, ORDER_NO, STATE, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DEPT, CREATE_TIME) values (#{FACTORY_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{FULL_NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{FACTORY_NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CONTACTS,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{PHONE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{MOBILE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{FAX,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CNOTE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{INSPECTOR,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ORDER_NO,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{STATE,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{CREATE_BY,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CREATE_DEPT,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CREATE_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

select sys_guid() from dual
insert into FACTORY_C
FACTORY_ID,
FULL_NAME,
FACTORY_NAME,
CONTACTS,
PHONE,
MOBILE,
FAX,
CNOTE,
INSPECTOR,
ORDER_NO,
STATE,

mapper.update:
update FACTORY_C
FULL_NAME = #{FULL_NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FACTORY_NAME = #{FACTORY_NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACTS = #{CONTACTS,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE = #{PHONE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE = #{MOBILE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAX = #{FAX,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CNOTE = #{CNOTE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INSPECTOR = #{INSPECTOR,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_NO = #{ORDER_NO,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATE = #{STATE,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_BY = #{CREATE_BY,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DEPT = #{CREATE_DEPT,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{CREATE_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where FACTORY_ID = #{FACTORY_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update FACTORY_C set FULL_NAME = #{FULL_NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FACTORY_NAME = #{FACTORY_NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACTS = #{CONTACTS,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE = #{PHONE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE = #{MOBILE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAX = #{FAX,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CNOTE = #{CNOTE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INSPECTOR = #{INSPECTOR,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_NO = #{ORDER_NO,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATE = #{STATE,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_BY = #{CREATE_BY,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DEPT = #{CREATE_DEPT,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{CREATE_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where FACTORY_ID = #{FACTORY_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
